q: `` not committed'' to supporting Barack Obama or a specific Republican candidate in 2012. Colin Powell , a retired Army general, said he won't decide whom to vote for until he sees all the candidates. Right now I do not see on the Republican side any one individual who I think is going to emerge at the top of the pile, he said, adding he thinks Barack Obama `` is doing a good job right now.'' Howard Stern calls Jay Leno a`` crook'' in interview Piers Morgan Tonight, the shock jock calls the NBC late-night host`` insane'' and accuses him of stealing sketch ideas. Jay Leno is a crook and the world knows exactly what he's up to. He steals a tremendous amount of material, The New York Post quoted Howard Stern as saying.`` This guy's ripped off like 10 major things from my show.'' Howard Stern also adds he's baffled that Jay Leno has beaten fellow late-night host David Letterman

Bernie Sanders ( technically an Independent, though he generally sides with Democrats) said Ryan's Roadmap would slash Social Security benefits and provide tax breaks for the wealthy, while raising taxes on just about everyone else. The fact of the matter is, Social Security has not contributed one nickel to our deficit or our national debt, and it must be protected, Sen. Bernie Sanders added.
